psidev.psi.mi.filemakers.xmlMaker.gui
Class FlatFilePanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  psidev.psi.mi.filemakers.xmlMaker.gui.FlatFilePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class FlatFilePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

The class provide graphical management for a tab delimited file
It allows to load a file, choose the field delimitor, and recursively enter into the fields and split them.

Author:
Arnaud Ceol, University of Rome "Tor Vergata", Mint group, arnaud@cbm.bio.uniroma2.it
See Also:
